column1: # python3 main.py --dataset FMNIST   --trainer split --base-classes 2  --step-size 2  --lr 0.01 --batch-size 64 --memory-budget 1000  --nepochs 20  --name S_FMNIST   > logs/S-FMNIST.log
# python3 main.py --dataset CIFAR10  --trainer split --base-classes 2  --step-size 2  --lr 0.01 --batch-size 64 --memory-budget 1000  --nepochs 50  --name S_CIFAR10  > logs/S-CIFAR10.log
# python3 main.py --dataset CIFAR100 --trainer split --base-classes 10 --step-size 10 --lr 0.01 --batch-size 64 --memory-budget 1000  --nepochs 100 --name S_CIFAR100 > logs/S-CIFAR100.log
# python3 main.py --dataset CORE50   --trainer split --base-classes 5  --step-size 5  --lr 0.01 --batch-size 64 --memory-budget 1000  --nepochs 10  --name S_CORE50   > logs/S-CORe50

column4: D.-W. (2021). Split-and-Bridge: Adaptable Class Incremental Learning within a Single Neural Network (arXiv:2107.01349). arXiv. http://arxiv.org/abs/2107.01349
